entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: allow exception marshallers via '[return: MarshalUsing]' on generated COM interfaces methods without '[PreserveSig]' #109522
    Future
  • Move dotnet/runtime to new RPM tooling #109518
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'bPrev->HasFlag(BBF_RETLESS_CALL)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109515
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'this->Next()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109514
    10.0.0
  • PipeWriter.UnflushedBytes `long` property wraps to negative numbers after `int.MaxValue` #109513
  • [browser] preload satelite assemblies when culture setter was trimmed #109504
    Future
  • Contract-based polymorphic support only sometimes works, depending on casting #109502
  • Test failure: readytorun/tests/mainv1/mainv1.cmd #109500
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #109499
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/VJ/RecursiveException/RecursiveException.cmd #109498
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_CategoryType_MultiInstance #109497
  • 'RuntimeType.TypeHandle' throws 'NotSupportedException' on NativeAOT after publishing with 0 ILC warnings #109496

Closed

  • Can the http headers constants be moved somewhere that isnt a "DotnetPlatform" package type? #109373
  • [wasm] System.Diagnostics.StackTrace.Tests.dll failure #108683
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonPropertyName` attribute to record member declarations #109411
  • Delete IL verifier from the JIT #32648
    Future
  • Native SIGSEGV crashes in mono_method_to_ir #109111
  • X.509 Cert #109478
    Future
  • Exception.TargetSite confusion #31998
  • System.GC.Collect() cannot be called in a Lua/LuaJIT callstack #109475
    Future
  • Problems with freezing when running Process #109489

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused `TypeHandle::GetDefiningModuleForOpenType` #109527
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Reapply "Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type" #109525
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109524
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't convert unreachable `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` blocks to `BBJ_THROW` during morph #109519
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109511
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109510
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update area owners #109509
    area-Meta
  • [DRAFT] Allow using H/3 with WinHttpHandler #109508
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • Clean up code with `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` #109507
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch BasicBlock hash code from bbNum to bbID #109506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add missing `lvTracked` check in `optLocalHasNonLoopUses` #109505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dedup remaining MemoryExtensions Span overloads #109501
    area-System.Memory

Merged

  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Revert "Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type" #109520
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest non-beta x64 image #109456
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest non-beta x64 image #109455
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 9.0.x
  • Fix condition in PAL's SetThreadDescription #109470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Version.Details.xml SHA typo #109389
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding info to debug WindowsAlternateDataStreamOverwrite failure #109399
    area-System.IO
  • [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0] Delete accidentally checked in file: src/libraries/System.IO.Ports/tests/file.pp #109290
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Fix ifdef for RawArrayData in NativeAOT Runtime.Base #109494
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2575058 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109458
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest image #109454
    area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Make ToDictionary() selectors parallel. #100590
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution
  • Avoid SerialPort IOLoop when there's no event handlers #102829
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Simple importer single-block forward substitution #109482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to seamlessly swap NuGet packages with source? #7334
    Backlog
  • Why does dotnet publish include files like Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll? #44579

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • NETSDK1221 warning for wpftmp.csproj projects #44605
  • dotnet format won't newline an empty catch block #44564
  • CLI - dotnet workload restore fails on solution if there is a .esproj project #44587
  • SDK doesn't find/use bundled library-packs when additional NuGet sources are specified. #44547
  • .NET to COM/ActiveX - params/ParamArray not supported for VB98/VB6 and earlier #44460
  • Assembly Version Conflict: Targeted net8.0-ios17.2 Project Fails with Microsoft.iOS, Version=18.0.0.0 Dependency Mismatch #44388
  • Weird progress indicators started appearing in stdout #44610
  • Errors occur when run dotnet cli on Windows with sudo. #44576
  • Should platform package pruning data represent GA of a framework or the serviced version? #44566
  • Directory.Build.props seems to write all of my intermediate files in the wrong location. #12064
  • dotnet test hangs with .NET9 RC1/RC2 in CI build on Ubuntu #43432
  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • vmr to macos-13 #44628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Set mediaType from http response if manifest mediaType is not present #44530
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSTest among common templates #44523
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The VBCSCompiler pipe name needs to normalize the path name #75714
    17.13

Closed

  • Test issue please ignore #75715
  • Compiler: thinks a local's type is that of another local #75710
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35504.12 #75712

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add wrapper service broker to allow for easy MEF consumption #75717
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use absolute path for CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath #75713
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose code actions to Razor cohosting #75711
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not include source generated documents in related document results #75718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75720
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Recalculate if LSP inlay hint cache miss #75709
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ProjectSystemProjectFactory.ConvertMetadataReferencesToProjectReferences_NoLock #75646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider.ComputeDifference #75639
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Modify Capacity growth rate to be linear instead of doubling on resize. #75708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make session related libraries trimmable #58787
  • Make authentication libraries trimmable #58786
    .NET 10 Planning
  • The Tags Property in OutputCache attribute is not working when using custom policies. #58785
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #58784
  • Stop embedding JS files in Endpoints and Server assemblies #58783
    10.0-preview1
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server - improve file name consistency with versioning #58782
  • Correlation failure #58780

Closed

  • Developers can safely trim ASP.NET apps to reduce their deployment payloads #27384
    .NET 10 Planning
  • `FromKeyedServices` Causes Generated Code to Fail to Compile #58633
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #58767
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58775
  • Correlation/Nonce cookies accummulated causing Nginx Request Header Or Cookie Too Large #58731
  • Can I add `TempData` to Blazor? #58779
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: json, json_spring #58679
  • dotnet watch run 自动退出，提示Exited with error code -1073740940 #58601
  • Blazor: Accessing HttpContext in a Client Project #58593
  • Blazor WebAssembly - HTML select tag with @onchange event does not hit breakpoint when clicking to select values from dropdown using the cursor, but works with up/down key from keyboard #58615

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Selenium packages #58791
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed the hot-keys for Blazor WebApp template options #58790
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #58789
    area-networking
  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58788
    area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Fix flaky ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #58735
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fully qualify type names for services when resolving in RequestDelegateGenerator #58640
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `df1544b` to `1204d63` #58746
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Use Linux machine with Chrome #58473
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58676
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738
    area-networking
  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Func<Claim, bool>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeRuntimeEventSource behaving poorly in conjunction with other providers #4825
    9.0.0

Updated

  • Help unmanaged memory #5023

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." when using a Preferences.Default.Get in MAUI #25676
  • Default configurations for Debug and Release mode #25675
  • FontImageSource icons not rendered correctly on Android #25673
  • Application.Current.Quit让人无语的严重Bug!!! #25672
  • .NET MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation bug #25669
  • Unable to Run MAUI Apps on Android 11 #25667
  • FilePicker returns null when running iOS app on macOS (not Catalyst) #25661
  • VerticalOptions and HorizontalOptions doesn't applied to the respective Layout #25658
  • ListView: table cells turn black randomly #25656
  • StackLayout inside Scrollview with horizontal orientation not expanding #25655

Closed

  • Navigation freeze the UI when clicking the [Back] button. #25597
  • The version of package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms isn't update to 9.0.0. #25623
  • Release build crashes on start in iOS, Debug build works just fine #25653
  • Android: Minimum and MaximumHeightRequest are not respected on controls when HeightRequest is also set (same for Width) #25163
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Binding context type check fails for relative binding sources #25608
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Waiting for debugger to attach error #25648
  • Did not run app #25659

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr10] Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25677
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Measure layout passes in DEBUG #25671
    community ✨
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • Fix issue with FilePicker for iOS apps running on Mac #25668
    community ✨
  • Remove `MeasureInvalidated` bubble-up mechanism and clean-up legacy layouts. #25664
    community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨
  • Revert to CV for Tests #25654
    area-testing
  • Skip invalidation on propagation #25652
    .NET 9 SR1

Merged

  • Update developer doc to direct installing VS 17.12 or newer, not 17.10 #25678
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    .NET 8 SR10
  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • [ci] Templates need xcodeselect #25640
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR1
  • [X] Delay binding context type check until relative binding source is resolved #25600
    .NET 9 SR1

Updated

  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR1
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR1
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled - UI Test #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • ExecuteUpdate: support partial updating inside JSON documents #28766
    Backlog
  • Json: error when trying to materialize json entity with nullable property that is null in the json string - should materialize the property as null instead #34293
  • JSON: InvalidOperationException by deleting entity with owned entities #34566
  • Optional alternate key properties #4415
    Backlog
  • invalid FK field name #35034
  • HasPendingModelChanges() always returns true #34967

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #35024 - Query could not be translated when using a static ICollection/IList field #35029
